data.title: Why MCI + Our Services
data.text:
We are staffed with the finest technical specialists with dozens of years of experience in the HVAC industry, specializing in control systems. Throughout the years, we have built many long term relationships. Partnering with engineers, business, property managers and contractors, we have worked relentlessly to develop and implement customized control solutions. We are well versed in maintenance, repair, and installation of many different control product lines along with the operational requirements of the HVAC equipment being controlled.

​Our partnership with Honeywell has allowed us to become a leading provider of HVAC control solutions in Minnesota and throughout the upper Midwest.

Minnesota Controls Inc. recommends Open License Niagara 4 based systems. With nearly a million installations worldwide, Niagara 4 is quickly becoming the operating system of choice in the HVAC industry. Its open API, open distribution business model and open protocol support give you the freedom to choose how you work, what you build and with whom you partner. There are more than 30 Niagara certified contractors and hundreds of certified technicians in the twin city metro area alone. The Niagara Platform enables you to connect and control devices, from nearly anywhere with nearly any device. Currently, Minnesota Controls is a Honeywell ACI Level partner. As a Honeywell Authorized Controls Integrator (ACI), MCI has attained the highest level for Honeywell independent contractors. With our ACI classification, we have full factory support and access to Honeywell′s complete line of HVAC building control solutions, including open N4 and AX based WEBs, BACnet and Lonworks controllers, as well as VFD′s and other commercial components.​​​

This means all our technicians are factory trained and certified by Honeywell to install and program Honeywell building automation equipment.

All our technicians are AX and Niagara 4 Certified meaning we know what the capabilities and limitations of our products and can make the best selection of equipment for any project.

We get the best warranty available from Honeywell to ensure your investment is protected for years to come.

This also means we are able to get some of the most competitive pricing in the industry.

MCI features truly open integration solution. The Honeywell WEBs platform eliminates costly future systems change out and enables cost effective new technology upgrades.

Web enabled technology allows sophisticated, secure remote access. Systems support SSL and TLS encryption, LDAP, configurable strong password requirement, login expiration and lockout features.

Minnesota Controls interfaces with the most communication protocols without the need for a gateway. Protocols include but are not limited to BACnet, LONWorks, MSTP, Modbus, Cbus, Mbusm, Johnson N2, SNMP, Barber' Colman/Invensys/ TAC ASD, DMS, Siems TEC Apogee, Trane iComm 3-5, andover infinity, American Auto' Matrix PUP and PHP.

Honeywell WEBs and Tridium Niagara AX have the largest local, national and international dealer network, ensuring a lifetime of cost effective choices and service support.
